name: There Is No Way Out
description:
This is a very short game, but yet never-ending.
A short continuation of my previous game HELL LOOP.

Everything that you see that is written is from my book "Our Little Heaven".
If you want to check out my book I would appreciate it.

Link to my book: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B084T37M97?pf_rd_r=KPGCAKRW8NTFJFQNNQHV&pf_rd_...

Check out my previous projects.

If you want you can donate or buy my book and allow me to invest more time into game making and writing more stories.
I would be more than grateful.

Enjoy.
